text: -dArtaqvA u#cyantEq ya EqvaM ~MviqdvA(gm)sa# EkAdaSarAqtramAsa#tE praqjAmEqva sRu#jantE praqjAmava# rundhatE praqjAM ~Mvi#ndantE praqjAva#ntO Bavantiq jyOti#ratirAqtrO Ba#vatiq jyOti#rEqva puqrastA$d-dadhatE suvaqrgasya# lOqkasyA-nu#KyAtyaiq pRuShThya#H ShaDaqhO Ba#vatiq ShaD vA RuqtavaqH ShaT pRuqShThAni# pRuqShThairEqvartUnaq-nvArO#hantyRuqtuBi#H saM~MvathsaqraM tE sa#M~Mvathsaqra Eqva prati# tiShThanti caturviq(gm)qSO Ba#vatiq catu#rvi(gm)SatyakSharA gAyaqtrI - [  ] 20
